title: Kardzhali
summary: Kardzhali (Bulgarian: Кърджали [ˈkɤrd͡ʒɐli], Kǎrdžali; Turkish: Kırcaali; Greek: Κάρτζαλι, Kártzali), sometimes spelt Kardžali or Kurdzhali, is a town in the Eastern Rhodopes in Bulgaria, centre of Kardzhali Municipality and Kardzhali Province. The noted Kardzhali Dam is located nearby.
